name: Bubble Gun Attack
description:
Have you ever wondering what it was like to be a robot that can shoot bubbles?  Me neither!  Well, anyway, you can play as one in this short game.  Steal from the humans by pushing your bubbled items over your launcher and sending them into space.  Or, throw them into a giant hole in the ground or just shoot them again for some explosive fun!

In the current state, there is no challenge.  You are invincible and there is no time limit.
